aka: 猜猜我有多爱你：小棕兔历险记

cast.name: 斯图尔特·艾伦 Stuart Allan

this_title: Guess How Much I Love You: The Adventures of Little Nutbrown Hare Season 2
trans_title: 猜猜我有多爱你 第二季
猜猜我有多爱你：小棕兔历险记
introduction: In this new series everyone’s favourite meadow friends are back, playing as joyfully and curiously as ever. Little Nutbrown Hare bounds through his days with enthusiasm, while the patient Big Nutbrown Hare leads his son on journeys of discovery. Together their meadow friends Little Field Mouse, Little Grey Squirrel, Little Redwood Fox and Little White Owl explore the meadows, forests and streams… playing, laughing and discovering the wonder that the world holds.Keeping love as the major theme,episodes continue to capture children’s real life experiences whilst enabling them to form a closer relationship with the amazing world they live in.Each adventure is set against the backdrop of a season, the wild flowers colours and beauty of Spring; the bright and playful Summer; the crisp leaves of Autumn and the snow covered meadow in Winter.From the bestselling picture book Guess How Much I Love You™,by Sam McBratney and Anita Jeram. Published by Walker Books.
chinese_title: 猜猜我有多爱你 第二季
foreign_title: Guess How Much I Love You: The Adventures of Little Nutbrown Hare Season 2
